TutorialData.Text: step onto these to save your progress

to melee, you can parry anything that flashes blue,
but not if it flashes red
step over items to pick them up automatically
to dash, grants IFrames for 1/2 a second
to slide, for extra mobility in the heat of a moment

rage is a powerful tool that can be attained from recieving
damage and dealing damage, but be wary, for this resource is not infinite!

to use your reflex mode, more commonly known as bullet time.
This will consume a lot of rage.
